name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Goodbye - Web Browser Language Learning Tutor

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new languages while browing the web, using AI.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learning a new language shouldn't feel like work.

Instead, use our extension to transform what you are already reading into different languages. This means you can learn a new language while browsing Reddit, Twitter, Substack, and more. 

Unlike other extensions, you can customize how much of the content on your screen you'd like translated. This means that you won't be overwhelmed, while still learning vocabulary.

Our method is more effective than traditional flashcards since you learn the usage of words in context, allowing you to gain a deeper understanding.

We value privacy. Your data will NEVER be sold to 3rd parties. If you'd like to understand the permissions our extension asks for, we've documented them clearly here: https://www.usegoodbye.com/privacy
